name: Dengage
author: dengage

sections.description:
This is the official plugin for Dengage that provides integration capabilities between Dengage and WordPress / WooCommerce. Dengage is a Marketing and Messaging Software as a Service (SaaS) provider whose solutions enable brands to automate digital customer engagement to improve customer experience, increase revenue, and reduce operating costs. Driven by a team of experts with vast experience in MarTech, the company offers a wide range of products and solutions available both in the Cloud and On-Premises.

Features:

  • Sync events to the Dengage platform including Page View Events, Search Events, and Add to Cart Events.
  • Sync transactional data to the Dengage platform including Orders, Customers, and Products.
  • Configure settings to manage the integration between WordPress and Dengage.

Important Notice:

This plugin sends data to and relies on the Dengage CDMP platform. By using this plugin, your website will communicate with Dengage’s servers to sync events, transactional data, and utilize other features provided by Dengage. Data sent to Dengage may include customer information, order details, product details, pixel data (such as page view events and shopping cart events), and other relevant e-commerce data. Please review Dengage’s terms of use and privacy policy to ensure compliance with your legal requirements.

  • Dengage Terms of Use
  • Dengage Privacy Policy
sections.installation:
Here is how you can install the Dengage plugin:

  1. Install Dengage from the plugin directory or download the zip file from the marketplace and extract it inside the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Click on the Dengage CDMP menu item.
  4. Enter the required settings (including the API credentials, region, and SDK script from the Dengage CDMP app).
  5. Once you save the settings, the plugin will be activated, and data will now automatically sync between WordPress and Dengage.
sections.faq:
What is the Dengage plugin for?

The Dengage plugin enables seamless sync of data between Dengage and WooCommerce / WordPress. You just have to install the plugin, configure the settings, and you will be all set to go in terms of the integration.

What events does this Dengage plugin sync?

This plugin syncs all standard e-commerce events including all page view events (home, category, product, cart, and others), all order events (begin checkout, order placed), all shopping cart events (add/remove from cart), and search events. All events are synced from the frontend using the Dengage SDK that is injected on your storefront by the plugin directly.

How can I sync old data to Dengage using the plugin?

When you install and activate the plugin, all previous records for orders, products, and customers are automatically queued and synced to Dengage, so you do not need to perform any additional steps for initial data load/sync.

Does this plugin support webpush functionality for Dengage?

Yes, the plugin supports webpush functionality by installing and configuring Dengage’s service worker file on your storefront.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Ensure that no PHP files can be accessed directly

1.1.0

  • Minor changes across the plugin (such as prefixing functions with dengage_) to make it compliant with the WordPress plugin guidelines and marketplace.

1.0.0

  • Stable version of the plugin with support for all features mentioned in the description.
